component.name: Feeel
component.summary: A simple home workout/exercise app that respects your privacy

description.p: Feeel is an open-source app for doing simple at-home exercises. It holds the acclaimed full body scientific 7-minute workout regime and allows creating custom workouts as well. While the app currently contains a limited amount of exercises, the plan is to drastically expand the number of both exercises and workouts with the help of the community.

ul.li: Mobile first, runs on Linux and Android
Private (fully offline, no tracking, no ads)
